title: ToG Season 1
description:
What do you desire? Money and wealth? Honor and pride? Authority and power? Revenge? Or something that transcends them all? Whatever you desireâ€”it's here.

--------------------

Hello fellow regulars!

This is a work-in-progress edited and retranslated version of season 1 of the original comic by SIU on Webtoon. This project aims to update and improve the source material's visual quality and preserve the original text's sentiment. Things it does to do that:

- Correcting mistranslations/grammatical errors
- Correcting visual errors in panels that are fixed in newer editions
- Reclaiming some artwork via smaller SFX/speech bubbles where possible
- Reintroducing missing panels, cut dialogue, and post-chapter extra comics
- Updating and standardizing font usage where possible
- Reintroducing the original Korean jokes and some honorifics where possible (and explaining them!)
- Standardizing terminology that gets constantly changed for no reason for a smoother, less confusing read throughout
- Adding SIU's chapter notes + blog posts for context and preservation (done by The Company and an anonymous user)

The chapters are constantly error-checked and updated thanks to community feedback :)

Enjoy!
~ @YeonFlame on X
author: SIU
